title: WTB Old Judge Player's League Cards, etc.
author: oldjudge

posts.post_title: WTB Old Judge Player's League Cards, etc.
posts.post_content:
I will pay generously for Player's League Old Judges I need. Please email me at [url]oldjudge@gmail.com[/url]. I also have interest in any scarce 19th century photographic cards, including Gypsy Queens, SF Hess, Lone Jacks, Four Base Hits, New York Kalamazoo Bats, Hancock Clothing, or team CdVs or Cabinets. I also am interested in N167s.

Thanks--Jay
